tika.dc.description: PHP is experiencing a renaissance, though it may be difficult to tell with all of the outdated PHP tutorials online. With this practical guide, you’ll learn how PHP has become a full-featured, mature language with object-orientation, namespaces, and a growing collection of reusable component libraries. You’ll learn best practices for application architecture and planning, databases, security, testing, debugging, and deployment.
dc.subject: php
o'reilly
